name: Environment Stability Test
description: Detailed environment with minimal foreground movement to test background consistency

sceneContext.summary: Camera slowly pans across a cozy cafe interior
sceneContext.environment: Warm coffee shop with exposed brick, wooden furniture, hanging plants

startKeyframe.prompt: Interior of a cozy artisan coffee shop, exposed red brick wall on the left, large windows with afternoon sunlight streaming in, vintage wooden tables and chairs, hanging pothos plants from the ceiling, espresso machine on marble counter in background, warm amber lighting, a single empty leather armchair in foreground left, professional interior photography, 4K, soft natural lighting
startKeyframe.negativePrompt: people, customers, barista, blurry, dark, overexposed, modern minimalist, sterile, clinical, text, signs, watermark

endKeyframe.prompt: Interior of the same cozy artisan coffee shop, camera has panned right to show more of the seating area, exposed red brick wall now on far left edge, large windows with afternoon sunlight, vintage wooden tables and chairs, hanging pothos plants from the ceiling, espresso machine on marble counter now centered, warm amber lighting, different leather armchair visible in foreground right, professional interior photography, 4K, soft natural lighting
endKeyframe.negativePrompt: people, customers, barista, blurry, dark, overexposed, modern minimalist, sterile, clinical, text, signs, watermark, different location, changed decor

videoContext.motionDescription: Smooth horizontal camera pan from left to right, revealing more of the cafe interior
videoContext.cameraMotion: Slow right pan, approximately 30 degrees over 3 seconds

expectedBehavior.primary: Environment elements must remain consistent as they move through frame
expectedBehavior.secondary: Lighting quality and color temperature should stay stable
expectedBehavior.challenges: Objects entering/exiting frame edges, maintaining brick texture consistency

environmentDetails.lightingDirection: Natural light from windows on right side
